availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Butcher, born on October 3, 1829. in Kentucky. Married to Julia Spohn. Children included Frank, and Mary A. Died on March 17, 1915 in Cynthiana, Kentucky

bibl.p: Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Cynthiana, ED 100, sheet 43D, NARA microfilm publication T9 (Washington D.C.: National Archives and Records Administration, n.d.), roll 0418; FHL microfilm 1,254,418; "Find A Grave Index," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:QVKD-WHCW : 13 December 2015), John S Spohn, 1915; Burial, Cynthiana, Harrison, Kentucky, United States of America, Battle Grove Cemetery; citing record ID 43077719, Find a Grave, http://www.findagrave.com.
